name: Date Syrup
benefits: Date syrup is a whole food natural sweetener that retains some of the fiber and nutrients from dates. Unlike refined sugars, it provides antioxidants and minerals. When used as a sweetener, it's a better choice than processed sugars, though should still be used in moderation.

quotes: ⅓ cup/75ml Date Syrup (here), at room temperature
Sprinkle with the cocoa, then drizzle with Date Syrup.
